snippet: The games that numerous people access via their electronic devices also double as a new way to maintain their real-life relationships.
abstract: Seth Schiesel Critic's Notebook on video games that allow players to send messages to each other and people who prefer to communicate with their real-life friends and families through games rather than email or phone calls.
lead_paragraph: The games that numerous people access via their electronic devices also double as a new way to maintain their real-life relationships.

headline.seo: The Electronic Games That Now Connect Us
